title: Enhancing App Development Practical Competencies: Augmented Reality-Based Historical Inquiry Learning for Historical Thinking Development

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary historical concepts comprehension (middle school-level history knowledge)
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can accurately analyze the causal relationships of historical events and figures with over 80% accuracy using an AR-based inquiry guide.
Learners demonstrate the ability to infer historical context in three or more levels by comparatively evaluating historical sources and AR content.
Learners record satisfaction levels improved by over 20% compared to pre-assessment in a historical learning interest survey after AR learning activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
